resources.string: Set the proportions of the dual pane in landscape mode
Make this folder the download location

This feature is not available in the Free version of the Chordinator.

The Song List screen in Chordinator Augmented shows all of your songs in a user-friendly way - takng the song title and artist from the tags in your song file. You cannot open files from this view in the free version of the app - please use the File Browser option to find your songs. Please consider upgrading to the Chordinator Augmented to enable this feature.

The Augmented app does not have any ads or annoying pop up messages.
